ActNational Capital Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the National Capital Commission to Grant Easements to the City of Ottawa, Ontario ***NCC***
PrecisOrder authorizing the National Capital Commission to GRANT EASEMENTS for a period of 99 years to the CITY OF OTTAWA, in Ottawa, Ontario for the Combined Sewage Storage Tunnel project.
